Package cz.ziki.had

Class Snake

java.lang.Object
cz.ziki.had.Snake
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject, Serializable
public class Snake extends Object implements GameObject, Serializable
Represents the snake in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Snake

      public Snake(int size, int startX, int startY, int bodyWidth, int bodyHeight, Rect background)
      Constructs a new snake with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the snake.
      startX - The starting x-coordinate of the snake.
      startY - The starting y-coordinate of the snake.
      bodyWidth - The width of each body piece.
      bodyHeight - The height of each body piece.
      background - The background rectangle of the game.

      public void grow()
